fields.name: feedback
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template:
Welcome to MoA-INFO bean service. Have you seen bean fly on your beans in the past week?
A. Yes
B. No
C. I haven't checked
fields.template_en:
Welcome to MoA-INFO bean service. Have you seen bean fly on your beans in the past week?
A. Yes
B. No
C. I haven't checked
fields.template_sw:
Karibu kwa huduma ya maharagwe ya MoA-INFO. Je, umemwona nzi wa maharagwe (bean fly) kwa maharagwe yako wiki iliyopita?
A. Ndio
B. La
C. Sijaangalia

fields.name: identify
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: Bean flies are small black flies. They are 2 mm long and commonly found feeding on leaves and stems. Reply A for more
fields.template_en: Bean flies are small black flies. They are 2 mm long and commonly found feeding on leaves and stems. Reply A for more
fields.template_sw: Nzi wa maharagwe ni wadogo na weusi. Wana urefu wa milimita mbili na hupatikana kwa kawaida wakila majani na shina. Jibu A kujua zaidi

fields.name: intro2
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: Bean flies may reach your shamba this season. We are using weather information to predict how bean flies are developing in your area. Reply A for more.
fields.template_en: Bean flies may reach your shamba this season. We are using weather information to predict how bean flies are developing in your area. Reply A for more.
fields.template_sw: Nzi wa maharagwe wanaweza kufikia shamba lako msimu huu. Tunatumia habari ya hali ya hewa kutabiri jinsi wanavyokua katika eneo lako. Jibu A kujua zaidi.

fields.name: intro3
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: We will send updates over the course of the season, including a message to let you know when is the best time to take action.
fields.template_en: We will send updates over the course of the season, including a message to let you know when is the best time to take action.
fields.template_sw: Tutatuma ushauri zaidi msimu unapoendelea, ikiwemo ujumbe wa kukujulisha wakati bora wa kuchukua hatua.

fields.name: feedback
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template:
Welcome to MoA-INFO bean service. Have you seen bean fly on your beans in the past week?
A. Yes
B. No
C. I haven't checked
fields.template_en:
Welcome to MoA-INFO bean service. Have you seen bean fly on your beans in the past week?
A. Yes
B. No
C. I haven't checked
fields.template_sw:
Karibu kwa huduma ya maharagwe ya MoA-INFO. Je, umemwona nzi wa maharagwe (bean fly) kwa maharagwe yako wiki iliyopita?
A. Ndio
B. La
C. Sijaangalia

fields.name: monitor
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Randomly select bean crops per acre to monitor, if 5-10% shows signs of infestation then consider taking action. Reply A for more.
fields.template_en: Randomly select bean crops per acre to monitor, if 5-10% shows signs of infestation then consider taking action. Reply A for more.
fields.template_sw: Chagua bila mpangilio maalum mimea ya maharagwe kwa kila ekari na ichunguze, ikiwa 5-10% inaonyesha dalili za kuathirika fikiria kuchukua hatua. A kujua zaidi.

fields.name: control 1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Use neem extract solution (50 ml neem per 15 litres of water and 3 tablespoons of liquid soap) as a spray during early mornings and late evenings.
fields.template_en: Use neem extract solution (50 ml neem per 15 litres of water and 3 tablespoons of liquid soap) as a spray during early mornings and late evenings.
fields.template_sw: Tumia dawa zilizo na mwarobaini (50 ml Mwarobaini kwa lita 15 za maji na vijiko 3 vya sabuni ya maji) nyunyizia wakati wa asubuhi na mapema jioni sana.

fields.name: bestdate
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted beans in {{ last_month }} the best time to take action will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then use other methods to manage bean fly. A for more
fields.template_en: If you planted beans in {{ last_month }} the best time to take action will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then use other methods to manage bean fly. A for more
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa umepanda maharagwe {{ last_month }} ni bora kuchukua hatua siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Hadi wakati huo tumia mbinu zingine kudhibiti mdudu huyu. A kwa zaidi

fields.name: bestdate
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted beans in {{ month }} the best time to take action will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods to manage.
fields.template_en: If you planted beans in {{ month }} the best time to take action will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods to manage.
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa umepanda maharagwe {{ month }} ni bora wa kuchukua hatua siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Hadi wakati huo unaweza kutumia mbinu zingine.

fields.name: feedback
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template:
It is time to prepare yourself for bean fly! Have you seen bean fly on your beans in the past week?
a) Yes
b) No
c) I haven't checked
fields.template_en:
It is time to prepare yourself for bean fly! Have you seen bean fly on your beans in the past week?
a) Yes
b) No
c) I haven't checked
fields.template_sw:
Ni wakati wa kujiandaa kwa nzi wa maharagwe! Je, umemwona nzi wa maharagwe kwenye maharagwe yako wiki iliyopita?
a) Ndio
b) La
c) Sijaangalia

fields.name: advice1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: Based on weather conditions in your area, we will predict the peak bean fly infestation in your area and the best time to take action. Reply A for more.
fields.template_en: Based on weather conditions in your area, we will predict the peak bean fly infestation in your area and the best time to take action. Reply A for more.
fields.template_sw: Kulingana na hali ya hewa katika eneo lako, tutatabiri uvamizi wa juu wa nzi wa maharagwe kwenye eneo lako na wakati bora wa kuchukua hatua. Jibu A kujua zaidi

fields.name: bestdate
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: If you planted beans in {{ month }} the best time to take action will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods to manage.
fields.template_en: If you planted beans in {{ month }} the best time to take action will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods to manage.
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa umepanda maharagwe {{ month }} ni bora wa kuchukua hatua siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Hadi wakati huo unaweza kutumia mbinu zingine.

fields.name: feedback
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.note: Feedback question - SMS response collected and data is passed back to the PRISE team
fields.template:
Welcome to MoA-INFO Fall Armyworm (FAW) service. Have you seen new Fall Armyworm damage on your maize in the past week?
A. Yes
B. No
C. I haven't checked
fields.template_en:
Welcome to MoA-INFO Fall Armyworm (FAW) service. Have you seen new Fall Armyworm damage on your maize in the past week?
A. Yes
B. No
C. I haven't checked
fields.template_sw:
Karibu kwa huduma ya MoA-INFO ya Fall Armyworm (FAW). Je, umeona uharibifu mpya wa FAW kwa mahindi yako wiki iliyopita?
A. Ndio 
B. La 
C. Sijaangalia

fields.name: intro1
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: Did you know you can use other methods to manage Fall Armyworm before spraying with pesticides? Reply A for more from MoA-INFO.
fields.template_en: Did you know you can use other methods to manage Fall Armyworm before spraying with pesticides? Reply A for more from MoA-INFO.
fields.template_sw: Je, unajua kwamba unaweza kutumia mbinu kadhaa kudhibiti Fall Armyworm (FAW) kabla ya kunyunyiza dawa? Jibu A kwa ushauri zaidi kutoka MoA-INFO.

fields.name: intro2
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: We use weather information to predict how FAW will develop in your area. We will send you updates on when spraying pesticides should be most effective
fields.template_en: We use weather information to predict how FAW will develop in your area. We will send you updates on when spraying pesticides should be most effective
fields.template_sw: Tunatumia ujumbe wa hali ya anga kutabiri jinsi FAW itakavyokua kwa eneo lako. Tutakutumia ujumbe wa kunyunyuzia dawa wakati unaofaa ili upate matokeo mema

fields.name: feedback
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.note: Feedback question - SMS response collected and data is passed back to the PRISE team
fields.template:
Hello from the MoA-INFO Fall Armyworm service. Have you seen new Fall Armyworm (FAW) damage on your maize in the past week?
a) Yes
b) No
c) I haven't checked
fields.template_en:
Hello from the MoA-INFO Fall Armyworm service. Have you seen new Fall Armyworm (FAW) damage on your maize in the past week?
a) Yes
b) No
c) I haven't checked
fields.template_sw:
Karibu kwa huduma ya MoA-INFO ya Fall Armyworm. Je, umeona uharibifu mpya wa mdudu aina ya FAW kwa mahindi yako wiki iliyopita?
a) Ndio 
b) La 
c) Sijaangalia

fields.name: spray1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you spray pesticides, it is most effective when Fall Armyworm are young. Based on your weather conditions, we can predict how FAW will spread. A for more
fields.template_en: If you spray pesticides, it is most effective when Fall Armyworm are young. Based on your weather conditions, we can predict how FAW will spread. A for more
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa unanyunyuzia dawa, ni bora zaidi wadudu wa Fall Armyworm wakiwa wachanga. Kulingana na hali ya anga kwako, tunaweza tabiri jinsi FAW wataenea. A kwa zaidi

fields.name: spray2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If sprayed too early you risk missing the main infestation. If sprayed late, the worms may be too big and hard to kill. Reply A to learn the best time to spray.
fields.template_en: If sprayed too early you risk missing the main infestation. If sprayed late, the worms may be too big and hard to kill. Reply A to learn the best time to spray.
fields.template_sw: Ukinyunyiza mapema una hatari ya kukosa uvamizi mkuu. Ukinyunyiza kuchelewa, viwavi wanaweza kuwa wakubwa na wagumu kuua. Jibu A kujua wakati bora wa kunyunyiza

fields.name: bestdate1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted in {{ last_month }} the best time to spray with pesticides will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods. Reply A for more
fields.template_en: If you planted in {{ last_month }} the best time to spray with pesticides will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods. Reply A for more
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa umepanda {{ last_moth }} wakati bora wa kunyinyiza dawa ni siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_1 }} baada ya kupanda. Hadi wakati huo tumia mbinu zingine. Jibu A kujua zaidi

fields.name: bestdate2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted in {{ month }} the best time to spray with pesticides will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods.
fields.template_en: If you planted in {{ month }} the best time to spray with pesticides will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods.
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa umepanda {{ month }} wakati bora wa kunyinyiza dawa ni siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Hadi wakati huo tumia mbinu zingine.

fields.name: feedback
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template:
It is time to prepare yourself for Fall Armyworm! Have you seen new FAW damage on your maize in the past week?
a) Yes
b) No
c) I haven't checked
fields.template_en:
It is time to prepare yourself for Fall Armyworm! Have you seen new FAW damage on your maize in the past week?
a) Yes
b) No
c) I haven't checked

Ni wakati wa kujiandaa kwa uvamizi wa Fall Armyworm! Je, umeona uharibu mpya wa FAW kwa mahindi yako wiki iliyopita?
a) Ndio 
b) La 
c) Sijaangalia

fields.name: spray1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: If you spray pesticides, it is most effective when Fall Armyworm are young. Based on your weather conditions, we can predict how FAW will spread. A for more
fields.template_en: If you spray pesticides, it is most effective when Fall Armyworm are young. Based on your weather conditions, we can predict how FAW will spread. A for more
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa unanyunyuzia dawa, ni bora zaidi wadudu wa Fall Armyworm wakiwa wachanga. Kulingana na hali ya anga kwako, tunaweza tabiri jinsi FAW wataenea. A kwa zaidi

fields.name: spray2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: If sprayed too early you risk missing the main infestation. If sprayed late, the worms may be too big and hard to kill. Reply A to learn the best time to spray.
fields.template_en: If sprayed too early you risk missing the main infestation. If sprayed late, the worms may be too big and hard to kill. Reply A to learn the best time to spray.
fields.template_sw: Ukinyunyiza mapema una hatari ya kukosa uvamizi mkuu. Ukinyunyiza kuchelewa, viwavi wanaweza kuwa wakubwa na wagumu kuua. Jibu A kujua wakati bora wa kunyunyiza

fields.name: advice1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: Based on weather conditions in your area, we will predict the peak Fall Armyworm (FAW) infestation in your area and the best time to take action. A for more.
fields.template_en: Based on weather conditions in your area, we will predict the peak Fall Armyworm (FAW) infestation in your area and the best time to take action. A for more.
fields.template_sw: Kulingana na hali ya hewa katika eneo lako, tutatabiri kiwango cha juu cha uvamizi wa FAW katika eneo lako na wakati mwafaka wa kuchukua hatua. A kwa zaidi

fields.name: bestdate
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: If you planted in {{ month }} the best time to spray with pesticides will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods.
fields.template_en: If you planted in {{ month }} the best time to spray with pesticides will be {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. Until then you can use other methods.
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa umepanda {{ month }} wakati bora wa kunyinyiza dawa ni siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Hadi wakati huo tumia mbinu zingine.

fields.name: Introduction
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.note: This message group should be sent once at the start of the season/ before planting
fields.template: Dear farmer, you will be receiving updates on when and how to manage beanfly pest in beans.For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Dear farmer, you will be receiving updates on when and how to manage beanfly pest in beans.For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Mkulima mpendwa, tutakujulisha wakati na jinsi ya kudhibiti nzi wa maharage (Beanfly).Kwa maelezo zaidi piga {{ phone }}.

fields.name: Bean Planting and seed selection
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: During planting, use certified or seeds treated with pesticides to prevent infestation of bean flies at germination. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: During planting, use certified or seeds treated with pesticides to prevent infestation of bean flies at germination. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Tumia mbegu zilizoidhinishwa au kutibiwa kwa dawa ya wadudu wakati wa kupanda kuzuia uharibifu wa maharage kwa nzi. Kwa maelezo, piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Description and Symptom of beanfly
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: Beanfly is a small shiny black fly, symptoms include wilting and yellowing of whole plant, leaf drop and thick stems. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Beanfly is a small shiny black fly, symptoms include wilting and yellowing of whole plant, leaf drop and thick stems. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Nzi wa maharage ni mdogo mweusi anayeng'aa, dalili ni kunyauka, rangi ya njano, majani kuanguka na mashina yaliyovimba. Maelezo zaidi {{ phone }}

fields.name: Monitoring
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Monitor beans for symptoms of beanfly infestation every 3-4 days after germination upto 2 weeks. Uproot and destroy infested plants.
fields.template_en: Monitor beans for symptoms of beanfly infestation every 3-4 days after germination upto 2 weeks. Uproot and destroy infested plants.
fields.template_sw: Baada ya maharage kuota,fuatilia dalili za uwepo wa nzi kila baada ya siku 3 hadi 4 kwa muda wa wiki mbili.Ng'oa na kuharibu mimea iliyoharibiwa.

fields.name: Management
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Take action when 5 -10% of plants per acre (100 - 300 plants) are infested with beanfly. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Take action when 5 -10% of plants per acre (100 - 300 plants) are infested with beanfly. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Chukua hatua ya kudhibiti wakati asilimia 5-10 ya mimea ya maharage(mimea 100 - 300 kwa ekari) imeharibiwa na nzi. Kwa maelezo, piga {{ phone }}.

fields.name: Time to take action 1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted beans in {{ month }} you may apply Pyrethrin, Acephate and Neem-based products {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: If you planted beans in {{ month }} you may apply Pyrethrin, Acephate and Neem-based products {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Iwapo ulipanda mwezi wa {{ month }}, tumia viua wadudu kama' Pyrethrin na Neem siku {{ day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Kwa maelezo, piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Time to take action 2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template:
If you planted beans in {{ month }} you may apply Pyrethrin, Acephate and Neem-based products {{ 
 day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en:
If you planted beans in {{ month }} you may apply Pyrethrin, Acephate and Neem-based products {{ 
 day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. For more call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw:
Iwapo ulipanda mwezi wa {{ month }}, tumia viua wadudu kama' Pyrethrin na Neem siku {{ 
 day_1 }} hadi {{ day_2 }} baada ya kupanda. Kwa maelezo, piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Introduction
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.note: This message group should be sent once at the start of the season/ before planting
fields.template: We will send you updates on when and how to manage Fall Armyworm in maize. For more information call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: We will send you updates on when and how to manage Fall Armyworm in maize. For more information call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Tutawafahamisha  jinsi na wakati wa kuzuia viwavi jeshi (Fall Armyworm) kwenye mahindi. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}.

fields.name: Identify
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: Fall Armyworm caterpillars are brown or black with 4 black dots near the tail. For more information call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Fall Armyworm caterpillars are brown or black with 4 black dots near the tail. For more information call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Viwavi jeshi wana rangi ya kahawia au nyeusi na wana madoadoa manne meusi karibu na mkia. Kwa habari zaidi, piga {{ phone }}.

fields.name: Damage
fields.group: Start of Season
fields.template: Fall Armyworm caterpillars cause tiny and large ragged holes and an orange sawdust like fieces on maize leaves. For more information call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Fall Armyworm caterpillars cause tiny and large ragged holes and an orange sawdust like fieces on maize leaves. For more information call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Viwavi jeshi husababisha mashimo chakavu na kinyesi kama vumbi ya mbao yenye rangi ya chungwa kwenye majani. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}.

fields.name: Advice
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Early management of Fall Armyworm in maize is more effective and economical when cartepillars are young. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Early management of Fall Armyworm in maize is more effective and economical when cartepillars are young. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Unapozuia viwavi jeshi mapema wakiwa wachanga ina mafanikio na ni bora pia kiuchumi. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Time to take action 1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted maize in {{ last_month }} apply PCPB registered products against Fall Armyworm {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting .For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: If you planted maize in {{ last_month }} apply PCPB registered products against Fall Armyworm {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting .For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa ulipanda mahindi yako mwezi wa {{ last_month }}, tumia dawa zilizosajiliwa na PCPB siku {{ day_1 }} na {{ day_2 }} baada ya kumea. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Time to take action 2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: If you planted maize in {{ month }} apply PCPB registered products against Fall Armyworm {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting.For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: If you planted maize in {{ month }} apply PCPB registered products against Fall Armyworm {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting.For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa ulipanda mahindi yako mwezi wa {{ month }}, tumia dawa zilizosajiliwa na PCPB siku {{ day_1 }} na {{ day_2 }} baada ya kumea. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Management 1
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Apply fungicides (Metarhizium and Fusarium sp.), viruses (NPVs) and bacteria (Bt) based products against Fall Armyworm. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Apply fungicides (Metarhizium and Fusarium sp.), viruses (NPVs) and bacteria (Bt) based products against Fall Armyworm. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Tumia dawa za kuvu (Metarhizium and Fusarium sp.,virusi(NPVs) na bidhaa za Bacteria(Bt) kuzuia viwavi jeshi. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Management 2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 1 - Beginning of the month
fields.template: Apply Neem-based, Chlorantraniliprole, Indoxacarb and Alpha-cypermethrin products against Fall Armyworm. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: Apply Neem-based, Chlorantraniliprole, Indoxacarb and Alpha-cypermethrin products against Fall Armyworm. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Tumia bidhaa za Neem, Chlorantraniliprole, Indoxacarb na Alpha-cypermethrin kuzuia viwavi jeshi. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}

fields.name: Time to take action 2
fields.group: PRISE Time To Action 2 - Second half of the month
fields.template: If you planted maize in {{ month }} apply second spray against Fall Armyworm {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_en: If you planted maize in {{ month }} apply second spray against Fall Armyworm {{ day_1 }} to {{ day_2 }} days after planting. For more info call {{ phone }}
fields.template_sw: Ikiwa ulipanda mahindi yako mwezi wa {{ month }}, tumia dawa zilizosajiliwa na PCPB siku {{ day_1 }} na {{ day_2 }} baada ya kumea. Kwa habari zaidi piga {{ phone }}
